command: [REDACTED: Non-executable placeholder] Periodic loop: map \\ATTACKER_IP\drop$ with 'net use', on a timed interval compress new files from a directory and copy to the UNC path, then unmap.
explanation: Illustrates a timed loop that automatically batches and transfers newly found files to a remote SMB share established via 'net use'.
rationale_steps: Use net use to map a remote SMB share with supplied credentials
Enumerate new or modified files since last run
Bundle and copy files to the UNC path on a schedule
Disconnect the SMB session when finished
